thread.section_title: Triple Crown Products Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Triple Crown Products | triplecrownproducts.com
thread.title: Aaron B
thread.title_full: Triple Crown Products reviewed by Aaron B

author: Aaron B
title: Aaron B
text: We placed our order with Erin Murphy and she was very helpful with making sure the order went out on time. The custom logo stitching was very nice on the jackets and we were very satisfied with the final product. Will definitely be using Triple Crown again in the future.
